page.title: 07GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: {LINE TIG.}Any number can play. One person is on and tries to tig you while you and he are running on the lines. If you go off you are out. {STUCK IN THE MUD.}You need about six people, and one or two people are on. If one person tigs you, you have to stand with your legs apart and arms up. To be freed someone crawls between your legs. {ELASTICS.}You need a length of elastic tied and held around two children's legs. People jump in, out, and on the elastic. This is the chant "Big Ben strikes ten, inside, outside, inside, on". {BULLDOG.}Everyone stands in a line, one person is on and calls out the name of someone, who runs across the playground, chased by the person who is on. If "Bulldog" is called everyone must run.
